name: Longshot
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Ultimate Combat. © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
components: V, S, M/DF (a piece of fletching)
text: This spell reduces the effect of range, granting a +10-foot bonus to the range increment of any weapon used by the subject.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料/法器 (一小片箭羽)
text_zh:
持续时间 1分钟/等级

这个法术减少距离的影响，可以让你使用任何武器进行范围攻击时射程增量增加10尺。
